about_the_game:
The Indian locomotive class WAP-7 is a class of 25 kV AC electric locomotives that was developed in 1999 by Chittaranjan Locomotive Works (CLW) for Indian Railways. It started service in 2000. The WAP-7 is the most Powerful passenger locomotives of Indian Railways. It has output of 6350 hp (4,740 kW) capable of hauling 24 coaches. Locomotives has a top speed of 180 KM/PH. This locomotive has a feature of Head on Generation (HOG) which eliminates the need of separate EOG set for power supply. The WAP-7 Locomotive is one of the most successful locomotives of Indian Railways.

Features of this Loco in Trainz

* Engine Start & Stop
* Weather Conditioned Windows
* Animated Wipers in Loco & Cab
* Spot Lights & Lamps in Cab
* Functional Doors & Sliding Windows
* Cab Functions
* Quick run in easy mode

*To start the loco, use the BL Key and raise the Pantograph using ZPT switch. Then switch On the BLDJ.
*To Shutdown the loco switch off the BLDJ.
